bibl.title: Lists of Men Undergoing the Yellow Fever Experiments, [19--]

div1.p: These are original lists of men undergoing the yellow fever experiments, with an autograph note by Hench.

div1.head: Lists of Men Undergoing the Yellow Fever Experiments, [19--]
div1.p: attack began
